jobDescription: Business Systems Analyst will have primary responsibility for gathering, analyzing, and documenting systems requirements for Counterparty Credit Stress Testing system. The Business Systems Analyst is broadly responsible for the following:Gathering, analyzing and documenting requirements for the Information Delivery modules of Counterparty Credit Stress Testing systemSupport Enterprise Data Governance controls for IT projects in flight, ensuring that data flows are explicitly defined and data use agreements are in place between providers and consumers; ensure all applications are cataloged in InfoSphere/ IGC; and document data lineage
